comment: * A builder for TtsSpans of type {@link #TYPE_VERBATIM}.

methods.name: public VerbatimBuilder setVerbatim(String verbatim)
methods.comment:
* Sets the {@link #ARG_VERBATIM} argument.
         * @param verbatim A string of characters that will be read verbatim,
         *     except whitespace.
         * @return This instance.
